scripts.build-guide: ng build --environment=guide --base-href ./ && rm -rf dist/assets/data && rm -rf guide_template && rm -rf src/electron/template/guide_template && mv dist guide_template && cp src/index-guide.html guide_template/index.html && cp -r guide_template src/electron/template/guide_template && rm -rf guide_template
scripts.deploy: npm run build-guide && npm run build-electron && ls && cd dist && ls && electron-packager . --asar --platform=win32 --electron-version=1.7.9 && zip -r win32.zip vxmaker-darwin-x64-win32-x64 && node ../deploy.js  --base-href ./
scripts.prepare-pack: rm -rf src/electron/icon && cp -r icon src/electron/ && npm run build-guide && npm run build-electron
scripts.pack-win32: npm run prepare-pack && cd dist && electron-packager . --asar --platform=win32 --electron-version=1.7.9 --icon=../icon/icon.ico --overwrite
scripts.pack-osx: npm run prepare-pack && cd dist && electron-packager . --asar --platform=darwin --osx-sign.type=distribution --electron-version=1.7.9 --icon=../icon/icon.icns --app-category-type=public.app-category.developer-tools && zip -r osx.zip vxmaker-darwin-x64
scripts.pack-linux: npm run prepare-pack && cd dist && electron-packager . --asar --platform=linux --arch=x64 --electron-version=1.7.9 --icon=../icon/icon.icns
scripts.win32-deploy: npm run pack-win32 && rm -rf ../vxmaker-win/installer && rm -rf ../vxmaker-win/icon && cp -r icon ../vxmaker-win/  && rm -rf ../vxmaker-win/vxmaker-win32-x64 && cp -r dist/vxmaker-win32-x64 ../vxmaker-win/ && rm -rf ../vxmaker-win/installer.js && cp -r installer.js ../vxmaker-win/installer.js && cd ../vxmaker-win && node installer.js
scripts.dmg: npm run pack-osx && cd dist && cd vxmaker-darwin-x64 && electron-installer-dmg --icon=../icon/icon.icns vxmaker.app vxmaker-beta
